icon_great_pyramid.componentleveltooltip: Great Pyramid||Location of a Great Pyramid, which is of great importance to the Tomb Kings. Provides access to a unique landmark building.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: ShouldShowWarCoordinationPendingRequest(this) || ShouldShowWarCoordinationPendingRequest(StationedForceContext) || (IsVisible && IsContextValid(WarCoordinationTargetterList.FirstContext) == false && IsContextValid(TargettingContext) && TargettingContext.IsValidTarget(StationedForceContext) && TargettingContext.IsValidTarget(this) == false && TargettingContext.CurrentTargetContext != StationedForceContext)
